item.description:
There have been a few of you who have expressed interest in attending Milton Nascimento's concert.

This concert is relatively soon, so please confirm your interest as soon as possible so I can gauge interest and then proceed with a plan to purchase tickets.

After we settle the concert details, I plan to set up a pre or post-concert gathering.

I would like to address the group in a week regarding this concert and also the Mariza's fado concert, so please look at your calendar and confirm your interest.

I look forward to these events.

Joana


Milton Nascimento
From Brazil
Sunday, November 15, 8:00 PM

Berklee Performance Center
136 Massachusetts Ave
Boston, 02115
Reserved seating
$42.00, $37.00, $30.00 (includes Berklee $1.00 restoration fee)

Milton Nascimento’s deeply moving music and rich, remarkable voice have made him an international legend and one of Brazil’s biggest stars. Beyond jazz and pop, his sound is a harmonious mix of African rhythms, Brazilian folk melodies, bossa nova and diverse undercurrents from across the globe.

http://www.worldmusic...

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Milton Nascimento Concert
